Tess and Jake race against the clock to bring the child home alive as Sunny pours all her focus away from her trauma and into the case. When Tess and Jake track down the perp in a tense OJ style pursuit, Tess's empathy defuses a potentially deadly standoff, reuniting the boy safely with his family and prompting her to reflect on her own family history. Meanwhile, Sunny fights back intrusive thoughts with self-defense classes, and Matt seems to be ready to move on from Tess but who is he dating?

programme.title: NCIS: HAWAI'I S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Into Thin Air - After a Marine's wife is kidnapped for ransom, the NCIS team uncovers dark secrets as they race to track down her abductor before it's too late. Meanwhile, Sam seeks Ernie's expertise decrypting a computer program that may have deadly ramifications.

programme.title: HUDSON & REX S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Run, Donovan, Run - When Superintendent Donovan transports an inmate, who happens to be his former partner, he finds himself confronting the past and caught up in a daring and dangerous escape.

programme.title: BLACKLIST, THE S10 Ep19
programme.desc: Room 417 - A cryptic tip from Red leads the task force to uncover a security breach within the U.S. government, Congressman Hudson takes major steps to uncover the inner workings of the task force.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Reckoning - When the Imperial Dukes reemerge, S.W.A.T. must mobilize to stop a large-scale attack. As Hondo (Shemar Moore) worries for Darryl (Deshae Frost), Deacon (Jay Harrington) grows uneasy with a new recruit.

programme.title: HUDSON & REX S5 Ep4
programme.desc: Hand Of Cod - After a severed hand is found in a box of frozen cod, the team must uncover the identity of both the victim and the killer behind the grisly crime.

programme.title: HUNTING PARTY, THE S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dr.ezekiel Malak - Dr. Ezekiel Malak, a hospital psychiatrist turned serial killer, is prowling for new victims in Chicago.

programme.title: FBI S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Doubted - Sydney seeks help from Isobel and the team in tracking down a meticulous serial offender.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Chain Reaction - During a routine interview at a chemical plant, Tess and Leo are trapped by a gunman looking to kill the plant's manager. Tess and Leo's attempt to evacuate the target and other workers safely is cut short when Leo is shot and injured, leaving Tess and Sunny to outsmart the gunman, escape the lockdown, and save the day. With unexpected help from Matt and Mia, Sunny guides Tess around the highly flammable plant to save Leo's life and uncover the gunman's motive before he blows them all up. Tess and Sunny are both blindsided by unsettling news as Lucas shares plans to get married, and Sunny finally uncovers Rigby's secret.

programme.title: NCIS: HAWAI'I S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Spill The Tea - When a high-value bioweapons expert is murdered in a secure facility on Hawai'i, NCIS and the NCIS Elite team join forces to track down the killer and discover an even deadlier threat.

programme.title: CORONER S2 Ep5
programme.desc: One Drum - In the aftermath of a mass shooting, Jenny's investigation is derailed when her exhaustion leads to dangerous consequences.

programme.title: BULLET TRAIN
programme.desc: In Bullet Train, Brad Pitt stars as Ladybug, an unlucky assassin determined to do his job peacefully after one too many gigs gone off the rails. Fate, however, may have other plans, as Ladybug's latest mission puts him on a collision course with lethal adversaries from around the globe - all with connected, yet conflicting, objectives - on the world's fastest train...and he's got to figure out how to get off. From the director of Deadpool 2, David Leitch, the end of the line is only the beginning in a wild, non-stop thrill ride through modern-day Japan.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Fresh Transparent Fashions For Spring / Witchs Delivery Service / Lost Dogs And The Patter Of Rain - Thanks to the easy-going nature of their peers, Nico and Morihito continue their everyday lives as a witch and an ogre. One day on the weekend, when Nico and Morihito are relaxing at home, a package arrives from Nico's mother, Ibuki. Attached is a letter addressed to Morihito, which had a new prophecy that read, Dogs and raindrops will bring disaster. Morihito is a little confused but tries to exercise cautious, and then

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Kanshi Kazamatsuri, The Tengu - In order to protect Nico, the crow familiar Kanshi Kazamatsuri appears before Nico and Morihito. Kanshi is a tengu who lived in the mountain where Nico was undergoing training. Like Morihito, Ibuki asks Kanshi to protect Nico, but Kanshi sees the ogre Morihito as an enemy. Despite that, it looks like Kanshi will be moving in with Nico and Morihito?

programme.desc: A beautiful, martial-arts-wielding genetic mutant defends her new race and a mysterious little boy.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep1
programme.desc: NCIS searches for a missing undercover agent in the midst of an active hostage situation.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep2
programme.desc: As Vance prepares to host diplomatic talks with Venezuela, the team is called in to investigate the dead body of one of his inside men.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep3
programme.desc: NCIS is called in to investigate when a lieutenant returns home on Halloween Eve to find a surprise party being thrown for someone else at his home.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep4
programme.desc: After receiving intelligence on deadly threats to multiple locations that could lead to a catastrophic war, NCIS is called in to try to neutralize the danger.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep5
programme.desc: NCIS works with the CIA to discover what secrets are being kept by Captain Butler, an elderly former spy with dementia.

programme.title: NCIS S22 Ep6
programme.desc: Things become tense when Knight is assigned to protect his wife after the home of a high-level defense contractor is attacked.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Paranormal enthusiasts Abby, Erin, Jillian and Patty set out to capture ghosts when they realise that someone is attempting to cause an apocalypse by summoning ghosts in the city of New York.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: Inspired by real WWII events, this film follows an American submarine crew tasked with capturing a German U-boat carrying the Enigma code machine. A tense, underwater action thriller full of deception, danger, and survival.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle For The Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Centers on a CIA officer who is fingered as a Russian sleeper spy. She eludes capture by superiors who are convinced she is out to assassinate the president. While trying to reunite with her family, she struggles to prove someone else is the traitor.

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: In 2084, construction worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall for a virtual Mars vacationbut the procedure unlocks hidden memories, thrusting him into a deadly rebellion and a secret-agent past.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: The Man With The Iron Fists

programme.desc: How do fresh flowers from the Netherlands reach Singapore in time for Valentine's Day, or fresh cherries from New Zealand for Chinese New Year? The second episode of Premium Rush: Inside Air Cargo Singapore traces the incredible journeys of time-sensitive seasonal shipments as they make their way to and through Singapore from across the world.

programme.title: Planet Earth III S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Human - Discover the extraordinary ways wildlife survives in a rapidly changing human world.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A flood brings new challenges for the big cats; for the first time, the lion cubs experience water and the danger it brings.

programme.title: Griff's Great American South S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Atlanta & Dahlonega - The New South - Griff samples Atlanta's bold energy, then heads to the Appalachians for gold rush tales.

programme.title: Anton and Giovanni's Adventures in Sicily S1 Ep3
programme.desc: For the final part of their trip around Sicily, Anton and Giovanni make their way to Gio's hometown of Palermo, stopping along the way to meet some beer-brewing monks.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep15
programme.desc: Visit the historic Michigan home of Alphabits cereal; the secret to a jet-black fettuccine is 3 litres of squid ink; every jar of a zesty garden mix is artfully packed by hand; and an Indiana candy factory produces more than 50 million gummy peaches per week.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep16
programme.desc: Once discontinued, the strawberry cheesecake frozen treat is back by popular demand; find out the secret to irresistible sea salt caramels; allergen-free bars pack all the satisfaction of a cinnamon bun; and a Toronto duo has put a modern twist on a Jewish culinary classic.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep3

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep17

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep18
programme.desc: Food Factory serves up ketchup-flavoured potato chips; Pal-o-Mine candy bars; Szechuan sauce, and, Candy Raisins.

programme.title: Hippo Watch with Steve Backshall S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Having learnt where a hippos aggression comes from Steve wants to find out if we can live alongside the animal that kills up to 500 people a year. He visits St.Lucia, a town where hippos roam the streets freely at night, feeding on the manicured lawns and bushes of the townsfolk. In order to see them out of the water he must come back at night.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Atlantic S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Martin Clunes explores the windswept Faroe Islands and their Viking heritage, then ends in spectacular Greenland with its Inuit traditions, calving glaciers and vast ice sheet.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S11 Ep15
programme.desc: Japan - This episode features Rupert, a Yorkshireman who moved to the remote countryside of southern Japan to grow rice.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secrets of Success - The secrets of canid success and their incredible strategies for survival, from leaping jackals to sneezing African wild dogs, and gray foxes that climb trees.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Series 3 - Robson heads to the Scottish Borders for an outdoor weekend with his uncle Matheson.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Series 3 - Robson is joined by his nephew, brother and uncle for a trip into County Durham.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep1
programme.desc: Series 5 - In Louisiana, Hurricane Ida destroys homes and lives. In Norway, High seas and high winds force a Captain to abandon ship. And in California, wildfires tear through the state.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep11
programme.desc: It's Never Easy - As winter turns to spring, Alaskans must seize the warming days. The everyday struggles of living in the secluded state of Alaska where one wrong decision could cost you your life.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Family - Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies - and raising them - is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Shadowlands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - Experience unbelievable acts of courage and loyalty by creatures trying to survive in the remote wilderness of New Zealand's South Island. Face forest penguins' feast and famine cycles, and explore the tumultuous world of newborn sea lions.

programme.title: Shadowlands S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - Learn how winter's arrival triggers animal survival instincts in southwestern New Zealand. Track dolphins as they move to warmer waters to give their calves a fighting chance, and join longfin eels on an epic migration to their spawning grounds.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the region's dark side.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Lost World of the Yucatan - Dive under Mexico's Yucatn rainforest into an elaborate network of flooded caves called cenotes. Learn how underground rivers feed the waterless surface on their way to the sea, supporting legions of bats, howler monkeys, and more curious species.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Heart of Sierra Gorda - Find surprises in Mexico's untamed Sierra Gorda biosphere. Prowl the arid semi-desert with horned lizards, marvel at axolotl regeneration in the river-fed foothills, and soar with monarch butterflies in the treetops high above a hazy cloud forest.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep4
programme.desc: A Sloth Bear's Dilemma - In a land of heat and tropical storms, life on the plains of southern India is tough. But Bibi, a female sloth bear with two cubs, is up for the challenge of her life as she fights against drought, food scarcity, and predators around every corner.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running With The Pack S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Packs - Connect with the three packs: the large Manzi pack in the lush heartland, the Kakuli pack in the Badlands, and the tiny Stork Colony pack living at the park's edge. Follow Julz as he shares their victories and defeats in this make-or-break season.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Lost World of the Yucatan - Dive under Mexico's Yucatn rainforest into an elaborate network of flooded caves called cenotes. Learn how underground rivers feed the waterless surface on their way to the sea, supporting legions of bats, howler monkeys, and more curious species.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Prides and Prejudice - As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as he's saved from snapping jaws and cements the family's future.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lean on Me - Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Growing Pains - Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary's orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla's fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rana: Queen of the Jungle - One of the most iconic animals on Earth stalks the jungles of India: the Bengal Tiger. Over the course of a single day, we follow the fortunes of one mother and her three young cubs. She must provide enough food for her family to stay alive.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding an Empire - Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires - like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.desc: A Close Encounter - Feel the heat as rising temps mean that water is getting scarce. The Manzi pack must stand alongside predators to hydrate at a remaining precious water spot. Hunt with Weka's pack to feed the pups, and watch the Stork Colony thrive against all odds.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep2

programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Gladiators S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tidelands - Head to America's far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Youngsters of the Desert - A young lion cub must survive as his family is torn apart, two adolescent leopard cubs must fend for themselves after they are abandoned, and a young adult blackbuck must risk life and limb as he tries to secure his first mating.

programme.desc: Animals Gone Wild - As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. programme.desc: From The City To The Coast - In the premiere episode, Marion Grasby invites viewers into her world, exploring the deep connection between her Asian-Australian heritage and her love of food.

programme.desc: Traditions Old New - In this episode, Marion explores the deep significance of culinary traditions -- both those passed down through generations and those newly created in her own kitchen.

programme.desc: Cooking With Soul - ORDER UP! follows 'Fresh Off the Boat' star Hudson Yang on the ultimate chef apprenticeship crash course across America to Singapore.

programme.title: Just Eat S1 Ep5
programme.desc: "Just Eat" is hosted by R&B singer Li Jiu Ze and Yao Yuan Hao, spreading their food knowledge all around Taiwan.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Written By - When Dulcinea searches for clues on the Crown of Souls, she finds the author of the Wee Compendium book and holds him hostage until she gets answers

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Fancy Feast - When Puss, Dulcinea and Uli search for a book filled with secrets of the Crown of Souls, they sneak into a mansion and trick an ogre named Tranche

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S2 Ep45
programme.desc: The Good Book - Julien hires Croc Ambassador, an etiquette expert, to teach the kingdom how to behave at a classy ball, but everyone is too uptight to party

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S2 Ep46
programme.desc: The King And Mrs. Mort - When King Julien gets sick, Mort must attend the Best Kingdom of Madagascar Award ceremony and comes back to find a Queen has taken his place

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep20
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail - Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep21
programme.desc: DJ's Glow Ride - Gabby receives a special nighttime delivery, unboxing a glow-in-the-dark train engine. However, she realizes that she's missing the other three train cars to complete the whole train. The Gabby Cats help Gabby build the other three glow-in-the-dark train cars by creating shapes through interactive/musical games. In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, DJ Catnip sings a song.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep71
programme.desc: Federal Slumber Party - Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he's applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby's cover at stake, it's up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep72
programme.desc: Floaties - A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep73
programme.desc: Breaking The Bank - Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina's new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Theres No Phil in Team - When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Thunder Games - When Gran announces it's time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she's got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Shock and Awww - Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Cold Open - Tom and the riders discover the Ice Realm and find Buzzsaw inside.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep22

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep23

programme.desc: D-Stroy - DStructs quest to find the location of the supercharger leaves him in a tight situation

programme.desc: Doom Run - The team travels to the Wastelands not the Dooms. They meet the Speed Trux who convinces the team to participate in the Doom Run race to try and win the part they need to fix Skya.

programme.title: Turbo F.a.s.t. S1 Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos , The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Turbo F.a.s.t. S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf , Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep21
programme.desc: It's On Like Amazon! - Wally and Wenda go on a mission to return the borrowed Quick Bloom Key to its owner, an Amazon-dwelling wizard named Vinebeard. But Odlulu intercepts the key so she can use its magic for her lemonade stand. Using local trails, Wally and Wenda must track Odlulu through the jungle. They'll have to raft the Amazon and brave Odlulu's ""living"" plants to complete their mission

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Mumbai Dance Party - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, it's up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep48
programme.desc: The Case Of The Frozen Toys - Noddy and Big Ears come to Fable Forest to see the Queen Sparklewings's magic crystal collection. But when they arrive at the Fairy Castle, they find all the toys there frozen like statues. What's going on. It's up to Noddy to investigate and help his friends return to their normal selves.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep49
programme.desc: The Case Of The Diabolo - Noddy's delighted to be given a diabolo by Big Ears. But when Noddy tries it out for the first time, the diabolo crashes and breaks in two. Even worse, when Noddy goes to retrieve the two halves, he finds that they're both missing! Noddy needs to investigate. Where is his new toy?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Lantern - Rupert, Edward and Bill go camping. Rupert is excited at the idea of playing 'explorers' but as darkness falls the friends are frightened by strange shadows and noises.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Ruperts Treasure Hunt - Raggety is getting the wood tidy for the annual visit of the Spring Inspector. If it's not looking its best, Spring won't go ahead and Raggety needs help from Rupert and his friends

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Why Hummingbird Hums - You see there was a time when Hummingbird didn't hum. She was called Songbird and Songbird thought she could sing like a Bird but sadly that was not the case. All the animals tried to help Songbird improve her singing but nothing worked. What could they do?! Then Tortoise has an idea, maybe Songbird can sing without opening her beak!! Songbird agrees and hums the most beautiful hum Tinga Tinga has ever heard. From that day on Songbird was called Hummingbird. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Why Baboon Has A Bare Bottom - You see there was a time when Baboon didn't have a bare bottom and he was very naughty. Baboon loved to play tricks. He played tricks on Elephant. He played tricks on Ostrich. He even dared to play tricks on Lion, the King of Tinga Tinga! And then all the animals decided it was time for the tricks to stop and Baboon to get a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy's Sleepover - When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Let's Make A Movie! - When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it's movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Gorgwatch Project - After Thunk and Guy tell Eep and Dawn a campfire story of Gorgwatch, a hideous monster who roams the woods, the girls are terrified. After a sleepless night, Guy and Thunk assure the girls it's just a made up story. Dawn and Eep are relieved until they find proof that Gorgwatch is real... and he's coming for them.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Decoy - Tom's leadership abilities come into question by Eugene when his decisions lead to failure while attempting to confront Buzzsaw.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai's stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he's possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng's body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Smidgician , DJ's Got Talent - Smidge tries to rescue the Trolls after thinking she has magical powers/ DJ Suki tries to impress her favorite niece CJ Suki

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rainy Day Banana - With a little help from Gabby's imagination, a sparkly toy banana turns into a magical Rainy Day Banana that helps Gabby and the Gabby Cats have fun on a rainy day! They have silly banana snacks with Cakey, make crafts to tell a story with Baby Box, and have an a-meow-zing banana dance party with DJ Catnip. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Cakey sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep23
programme.desc: CatRat The Bandit - The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep21
programme.desc: She Said, She Said , Starfish - When one of Rikki's plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about, but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Leroys Caterpillar , Lost Spark - Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don't) Snooze, You Lose , Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! , A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Titan Up - When the Orphans start rumors that Puss has special powers, Taranis the God of Thunder asks Puss to help defeat the most powerful God of all, Toutatis

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Boar Games - When Roz the boar comes to San Lorenzo to collect a bounty for capturing Puss, Pajuna tries to keep them separated before an epic fight breaks out

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimi's not exactly who she says she is. Our villains' alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S2 Ep47
programme.desc: King Julien: Superstar! - Julien, Clover, Mort and Maurice become music sensations overnight, but the band breaks up over Julien and Clover's non-stop fighting

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S2 Ep48
programme.desc: The Panchurian Candidate - After Uncle King Julien turned Pancho into a deadly killer so he could take back his throne, King Julien must save the kingdom before it's too late

programme.desc: Rainy Day Banana - With a little help from Gabby's imagination, a sparkly toy banana turns into a magical Rainy Day Banana that helps Gabby and the Gabby Cats have fun on a rainy day! programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep74
programme.desc: Hate That Baby! - After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits' attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep75
programme.desc: North of the Border - With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But he's forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Boss's fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep76
programme.desc: Intensive Purposes - After getting caught at the border, Boss, Tim, JJ, and Pip have to organize an escape from a former novelty restaurant turned interrogation facility using only the four phone calls they've been given. Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but it's complicated when Tina's new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dez's undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Straycation Part I - The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - they're so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Straycation Part II - While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep14

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 2 - When Thunder's clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harold's latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep6

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Explorers - While waiting to be picked up from school, Jack plays at being a sailor trying to find his way back home to Australia. Meanwhile, Jack's Dad has got lost on route to collect him.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Phones - Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurants with Grandad, but it's a little different than he's used to... he's going to need an app to order the food!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep45
programme.desc: The Singing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels are out on a walk in the countryside. Its been a long walk and the squirrels are starting to get tired, but it's a long way back. Don't worry, Duggee has his singing badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep44
programme.desc: The Comedy Badge - The squirrels go to see what Duggee is doing but on the way Tag stumbles on some toy blocks and hurts his knee. How can they make him feel better? Happy's mum says laughter is the best medicine.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Ladybird's Gameshow - Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia - A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Plum - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Plum performing the Sugar Plum Fairy Bounce and attempting to do not one, not two, but three pirouettes in midair!

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Corn - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Corn singing an A-maiz-ing Counting Song about his remarkably organised kernel rows.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Broccoli Alone - Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Pea Repeats - Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep88
programme.desc: Listen - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po take it in turns to listen to music through a pair of headphones. The Teletubbies love dancing to the music they hear.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: Spider - Dee encourages a friend to say 'spider' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different spiders!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Howdy There Hooper - The friends want Hooper to be the sheriff of Pop Paper City and make him a hobby horse.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Messy's Mega Power - The Oki-dokis are about to perform when OKIDO runs out of electricity! Anxious that their favourite band might not be able to play, can Messy and his friends find a new way of powering the concert?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Relax - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Exercise - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep13
programme.desc: The Good Choices - The Squirrels haven't been making good choices round the messy clubhouse. With Duggee's help, they start to get it right. But not before sending Roly's imagination into overdrive!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep12
programme.desc: The Waiting Badge - When they're accidentally shut in the shed, Duggee shows the Squirrels how to make the time pass with calm breathing and made-up games. The Squirrels cope so well. Does Duggee?

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Frog Song - It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia - A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Beach - As Mum goes for a walk along the beach, Bluey runs to catch up with her. Along the way, she has a series of encounters that both excite and test her in her first solo adventure.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Library - When Muffin is told that she is special by her dad, she interprets it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingo's game of library her way.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Lar Gibbons - Andy encounters some baby Lar Gibbons in Thailand that appear to be flying as they swing through the rainforest.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mission: Rambler Badge - Jamie and his search-and-rescue dog Dan head for the hills to earn their Compass Badge searching for some missing ramblers and their teachers.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Giant Anteater and Chimpanzee - Steve and Aneeshwar meet a giant anteater and give him his breakfast in a long tube. Next, they meet some chimpanzees to find out the wild connection between these two animals.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep26
programme.desc: Gem's Magic Moments - Squawk takes us on a journey to find Gem's top Swashbuckle moments.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep42
programme.desc: The Organising Badge - Roly is trying to force a very large plastic ball into the bin, but it flies out and crashes into a tower that Betty has built.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep41
programme.desc: The Grandparents Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are tidying up - its Bring your Grandparents to Squirrel Club Day. Duggee has his Grandparents badge so he knows what they will like, a nice cup of tea.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep40
programme.desc: The Wedding Badge - King Tiger has met his perfect partner and he is getting married. It's going to be a royal wedding!! The squirrels are to be special Guests of Honour, but who is King Tiger marrying!?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Amelia Earhart - Inspired by her hero Amelia Earhart, Xuli attempts a solo flight across the Atlantic.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Solar Race: Australia - Glitch hopes to win a solar-powered race across the Australian outback.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep11
programme.desc: Sonny's Second Chance - Sonny returns to Sodor to try to be a really useful engine again but some of the other trains aren't willing to give him a second chance.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Cake Decorate - Cake decides to teach Sarah and Duck how to decorate with icing!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Balloon Barnacles - Sarah's hat goes on an adventure without her, on top of a balloon.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Shipwreck - Benjamin and Hettie find an old treasure map that leads to Blue Whiskers' Pirate Shipwreck! They ask Stanley to help them find it and maybe bring it back to show the townsfolk.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Power - Stanley needs to do some jobs for the community, but all his vehicles are out of power due to a cloud of butterflies obscuring them and he needs to figure out how to move them.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Pea Soup - Monty thinks Gran's soup might be the tastiest ever, but he wonders how you can know if something is the best in the world.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep4
programme.desc: It's time for a spring clear out - JoJo and Gran Gran are having a spring clear out, but when Gran Gran wants to clear out her old jumper, JoJo is distraught - she loves that snuggly jumper!

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 - 10
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola - 1

Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.desc: The UFC heavyweight world championship will be on the line on October 25 at Etihad Arena in Abu Dhabi when Tom Aspinall defends his undisputed crown for the first time against Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 321. England's Aspinall has ended his last three wins by knockout, including an interim title-winning effort over Sergei Pavlovich and a successful defense against Curtis Blaydes. This fall, he will face another stern test in French star Gane, a former interim champ looking to add undisputed goal to his trophy case after back-to-back wins over Serghei Spivac and Alexander Volkov
